import React,{Component} from 'react'; import {post} from 'axios'; import './signup.css'; class SignUp extends Component{ state = { username:'', firstname:'', surname:'', email:'', password:'' } onChange = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } onSubmit = () => { const {username,firstname,surname,email,password} = this.state; post('/user/login',{username,firstname,surname,email,password}) } render(){ const {username,firstname,surname,email,password} = this.state; return (
